Package laazotea.indi.androidui

Provides the classes to produce a simple Android interface for all INDI Devices, Properties and Elements.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
I4JAndroidConfig A class to centralize a Handler and Context for all INDI Android Views.
INDIAndroidBasicActivity An Android Activity that implements a INDI Basic Client.
INDIBLOBElementView An class representing a View of a BLOB Element.
INDIDefaultPropertyView An class representing a View of a Property.
INDIDeviceView An class representing a View of a Device.
INDIElementView An abstract class representing a View of a Element.
INDILightElementView An class representing a View of a Light Element.
INDINumberElementView An class representing a View of a Number Element.
INDIPropertyView An abstract class representing a View of a Property.
INDISwitchElementView An class representing a View of a Switch Element.
INDITextElementView An class representing a View of a Text Element.
 

Package laazotea.indi.androidui Description

Provides the classes to produce a simple Android interface for all INDI Devices, Properties and Elements. This classes are usually instantiated from the corresponding client classes through the method getDefaultUIComponent() in various Client classes.

A simple application example laazotea.indi.androidui.INDIAndroidBasicActivity is provided.

See Also:
laazotea.indi.client, INDIAndroidBasicActivity
